mapper.select: select rno, dno, replyer, content, writedate, user_image from oc_reply, oc_user where oc_reply.replyer = oc_user.user_id and dno=#{dno} order by writedate desc
mapper.insert: insert into oc_reply(rno, dno, replyer, content) values(oc_reply_seq.nextval, #{dno}, #{replyer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select count(dno) from oc_reply where dno=#{dno}
